title: Throne-back Cover
description: Shaped throne-back cover of imperial yellow satin brocade. In a field with loosely-drawn clouds and a bat, five five-clawed dragons in gold the large central one seated, the four surrounding ones in profile. Below, the Eternal Sea motif, with deeply rolling waves dotted with symbols of the Eight Precious Things. Colors include shades of blue, red, green, and pink. Boxed border of the yellow satin brocaded with a design of spaced, loosely-drawn clouds. Seal inscription. Lining of yellow satin.
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
